name: Golden Delicious Apple Sherbet
nutshell:
Short collection of romance stories by author Umino Tsunami.
Content:

Chapter 1. Golden Delicious Apple Sherbet (ゴールデン・デリシャス・アップルシャーベット)
Chapter 2. Girly
Chapter 3. Hachimitsu (はちみつ)
Chapter 4. Vampire - Akai Natsu (ヴァンパイア―朱い夏―)
Chapter 5. Waka Okusama to Boku (若奥様と僕)

name: Let's study, shall we?
nutshell: One day, smart girl Yoo Chae Won was asked by problem girl Hong Yu Jin to help her study.

name: Fancy Mate
nutshell: A pure fool + pervert Lim Tae-oh dreaming of a love-filled relationship. Since he is gay, he is isolated from his parents and is also at odds with his friends. Even the men he dated can't overcome Tae-oh's obsession and had break ups many times. In the end, he thinks it's his last challenge and finds a roommate who's sexy... But then, he met Choi Hyun, a roommate who suited Tae-oh's taste more than he could have imagined! Like fate, he fell in love at first sight. Tae-oh who needs love and Choi Hyun who needs attention. Will this love be successful?

name: Mawaru Penguindrum - The One Who Will Bring Me Away (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
A short Pixiv doujinshi of the Kanba x Himari couple from Mawaru Penguindrum.
Terminally ill Himari Takakura wants to go outside with her brothers more than anything. However, that is a wish that won't come true, though Kanba refuses to accept it. Even if…

name: Mimitabu no Riyuu
nutshell:
1: Mimitabu no Riyuu (A Reason For Earlobes)
Yamaguchi is a notorious womanizer. Some men admire him; others can't stand him. Ishikawa is definitely one of the latter. Nevertheless, when Yamaguchi's latest girlfriend dumps him, Ishikawa jokingly offers to comfort him with his own body. Unfortunately for Ishikawa, Yamaguchi takes the offer seriously. And, to make matters worse, Ishikawa discovers that he can't say no!
2: Yubisaki no Biyaku (Love Potion Fingertips)
Ishikawa and Yamaguchi are dating, but Yamaguchi's lovey-dovey behavior makes Ishikawa sick. Hoping to put Yamaguchi in his place, Ishikawa suggests that they "see other people." But things take a turn for the worse when each one catches the other with a beautiful woman.
3: Kuchibiru no Teppen (The Top Of The Lip)
Ishikawa usually wears an irritable scowl. So why is he laughing and smiling so happily? Is it because he likes homemade sweets… or the cute girl who made them? Consumed with jealousy, Yamaguchi's patience is pushed to the limit.
4: Tsumuji no Mannaka (The Center Of The Hair Whorl)
Ishikawa's nightmare is in danger of becoming reality. His boyfriend, Yamaguchi, is trying to win over his family! Fearing for his future, Ishikawa forbids Yamaguchi to visit his home, but Yamaguchi is determined to get close to the Ishikawas, one way or another. If Ishikawa won't accept him, then maybe Ishikawa's sister, Hitomi, will…
5: Ushirosugata no Natsu no Neko (The Summer Cat Turns Its Back)
After bad news from the doctor, a man reminices about a young man he went to school with, but then young man appears and he hasn't aged…

name: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann - Spiral Boy
nutshell: A re-imagining of Gurren Lagann . In this alternate version of TTGL, Simon lives in Tepelen city and dreams of becoming a Gunmen pilot after having seen the stars through a crack in the sky. One day, he comes across a strange small Gunmen. The hatch opens, and out comes a beautiful girl named Nia.

name: Touhou Project - Meiling x Sakuya Tummy Kisses
tags: Oneshot,Video Games,Girls' Love,Web Comic,Slice of Life
nutshell:
Slightly erotic? Yes it is.
 Artist’s Twitter
 Artist’s Pixiv

name: Hidoi Otoko
nutshell: Tsubasa and Eiji have been dating for over 2 years, but their bedroom action hasn't progressed very much. Eiji, a man in his thirties with unmet sexual needs, has been using a substitute, waiting for the day when Tsubasa wants to go all the way. Tsubasa, being younger, fears that his inexperience will turn Eiji away. Can these two come to an agreement in the bedroom? And why is Tsubasa in the living room naked with cat ears?

name: Another's Love Story
nutshell:
Is love a luxury for me?
Seon-ah is hard working, strong, and level-headed, but she has a hard time expressing her feelings. Especially romantic feelings.
What's so great about love that people are willing to die for it? What does that feel like? She can't relate as she has never experienced sincere love before, due to her delusional concerns that she can't let go of.
On the day that she broke up with her cheating boyfriend (whom she met through a friend of a friend), Seon-ah unexpectedly meets someone new.
What will happen this time?

name: Good/Bad Fortune
nutshell:
Be careful! If you meet them, your fate will change...!

• Naver Webtoon Fan Translation (English)

name: Tensei Mae wa Otoko Datta no de Gyaku Harem wa Okotowari Shite Orimasu
nutshell:
Tasuku Nakamura, who was thrown into the sea in a marine accident and tried to help his best friend, ended his short life of 25 years.
Formerly a mediocre office worker, when he opened his eyes, he was in the form of a six-year-old baron's daughter, Sophie Linier.
At first she was confused by the changes, but she was reincarnated as a beautiful girl and decided to live as a lady in a different world.
The struggle of a 6-year-old girl with the soul of a 25-year-old boy begins ... !!

name: As You Wish, Prince
nutshell:
"If you wrote me, then you can give me the throne!"
Yoonsoo is the successful author of a popular fantasy series. Just as she's about to start work on a new series, Imperial Prince Kyte Einzen, the worst villain she created has kidnapped her into the world of her own story?! Can she mold this nightmare into a story that will turn both their fates around? Based on the hit novel.

name: Masterpiece Rakugo Complete Works
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
Rakugo is a form of storytelling performed by a storyteller, and it has been perfected as an art of listening. What would happen if rakugo were made into a manga? George Akiyama took up the challenge! The collection contains 33 masterpieces of rakugo. Enjoy reading Rakugo.

name: Dr. no Fureru Yubisaki
nutshell:
Hospital of Hakusan University is popular with handsome doctors. Godhand Doctor, a genius for surgical. Will you fall in love if you are touched by those gentle hands? Smile Doctor, a dermatologist who always smiles. Will his smile make your heart beat faster? Iceman Doctor, a cool pediatrician who keeps an unexpected side?
Which doctor will you choose?

name: White Lilies in Love - BRIDE's Newlywed Yuri Anthology
nutshell:
This is an anthology full of newlywed yuri themed stories.
Haru Hisakawa’s Yome ga Toutoi (lit. My Bride is Precious) is about a woman being concerned about her bride who is avoiding sex immediately after getting married.
Kozumi Miura’s Watashi no Kanojo ga Kawaii Riyuu (lit. The Reason Why My Girlfriend is so Cute) depicts a couple’s newlywed feelings, who has been in love for 10 years and has just started to live together.
Ryo Tsuzura’s Kitsune no Yomeiri tells the story of a woman who lost her lover just shortly before their wedding.
Cover art: Kagachi Saku

name: Ayakashi Reika
nutshell: Rin, having lost her grandmother, her only family, is now all alone. A suspicious man wearing a fox mask named Jin appears, claiming that Rin is half-human and half-demon. Although distrusting at first, the moment Rin encounters demon powers her body starts aching...?!

name: The Boy in a Girls' Academy
nutshell: In girls' school filled with jaw-dropping beauties, here comes a new male student!!! Perhaps in the eyes of others, this would be a dream-like paradise, but in reality, the future is completely unimaginable…

name: Togainu no Chi – Mekakushi Oni
nutshell: PAIRING: Shiki x Akira

name: Switch Witch
nutshell:
A strong witch with commitment issues gets adopted when they are in a cat form and now they don't know how to tell this to their cute owner.
Maya pronouns: They/She.
Nona pronouns: They/them.

name: Digimon Dreamers
nutshell: One day, Ritsu Kodo, a country boy, is sent into the world of the game he is playing, the Digital World! There, he meets the Digimon Pulsemon he created in the game!! Ritsu was baffled by the sudden turn of events, but when he learned that his partner Pulsemon had summoned him as his Tamer to break the 'cannot evolve' curse, he promised cooperation in evolution...!!

name: Glen (글렌)
nutshell: Joseph lived an ordinary life and it all took a turn when he realized he was being stalked. First, his school, then his locker, his phone and eventually his home- every aspect of his life was infiltrated by his stalker. Joseph is at his wits' end when Glen, a stranger, steps into his life at just the right moment and offers him a helping hand.

name: Madoka no Himitsu
nutshell: Yamada Madoka (♂) loves all sorts of cute things! He grew up playing with dolls, sleeping with stuffed animals, and wearing girl's clothes that his sister made for him! The problem is, other people just don't understand, so when Madoka's family moves to a new city, he commits to acting like a boy at school. But what happens when his neighbor, Tanonaka Itsuki, finds out about his inclinations?!

name: Attack on Titan - Song of Prayer Dedicated to You (Doujinshi)
Nanatsu no Taizai: Hajimari wo Sasou Ame no Mori
nutshell: A side story focusing on Lancelot, Ban and Elaine's son.

name: Raimei to Futatsuboshi
nutshell: A distorted triangle, a new history begins …

name: Tamiko to Visualkei to
nutshell: An adolescent girl with downcast eyes. When she mumbles, "If only I could disappear like this...", a visual-kei person appears in front of her!

name: Super Mario World Nintendo Official Guidebook
nutshell: Two guidebooks for Super Mario World published by APE Inc. with a variety of comics and 4-koma.

name: IseQuar Beach manga
nutshell:
An IseQuar Beach manga
※With a hint of Demi-Love flavor

name: Building the Strongest Shaolin Temple in Another World
nutshell: The young Huo Yuanzhen crossed into another world and became a small faction – Shaolin Abbot Yi Jie. In order to save his life and complete the task of the “Abbot System”, Huo Yuanzhen had to start to find ways to deceive Shaolin believers and make incense more prosperous. The rise of Shaolin has made the surrounding factions panic. They secretly made ruthless moves to suppress Shaolin, but were slapped by Huo Yuanzhen. The strength of Shaolin and Shaolin Abbot even attracted the son of the royal family.

name: Nekomaki
nutshell: A simple comic about the adventure (and misadventures) of two cats
